content: in spsc 2 rounds directly below repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join place marker in last spsc of round 18 21 24 single_crochet 6 7 8 spsc round 5 ch2 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 3 sts *2dc in next st round 13 repeat round 11 double_crochet in next 3 sts repeat from * around slip_stitch in first double_crochet to join round 14 ch1 single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in the marked spsc 2 rounds below do not move marker 30 35 40 double_crochet and 2 stitches behind current position *single_crochet skip spsc spsc in spsc 2 rounds below and 3 stitches in front of current position single_crochet in 3 double_crochet round 6 ch1 single_crochet in first double_crochet spsc in the marked spsc 2 rounds spsc in same spsc as last spsc repeat from * around to last 2 double_crochet single_crochet below and 2 sts behind current position single_crochet in 2 double_crochet *spsc in spsc 2 spsc in marked spsc slip_stitch in first double_crochet to join move marker up to first rounds below and 2 sts in front of current position single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc spsc of round 48 56 64 single_crochet 24 28 32 spsc in the same stitch as last spsc single_crochet in 2 double_crochet repeat from * around to last 2 double_crochet spsc in marked spsc 2 rounds below and 2 sts in front of round 15 repeat round 11 current position single_crochet in 2 double_crochet slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join remove marker 30 35 40 single_crochet 12 14 16 spsc round 16 ch1 single_crochet spsc in spsc 2 rounds below and 3 stitches in front of current position single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in same spsc as last round 7 ch2 2dc in first st double_crochet in next 6 sts *2dc in next st *single_crochet skip spsc directly below spsc in spsc 2 rounds below and 3 double_crochet in next 6 sts repeat from * around slip_stitch in first double_crochet to join stitches in front of current position single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in same spsc as 48 56 64 double_crochet last repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join move marker up to first spsc of round 48 56 64 single_crochet 24 28 32 spsc round 8 - ch1 *single_crochet in 2 double_crochet spsc in spsc 2 rounds directly below single_crochet in 2 double_crochet repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join round 17 repeat round 11 48 56 64 single_crochet 12 14 16 spsc repeat rounds 14-17 until hat is desired length round 9 ch2 double_crochet in each st around 60 70 80 double_crochet end hat body on an odd numbered round round 10 - ch1 *single_crochet in 3 double_crochet spsc in spsc 2 rounds directly below brim single_crochet in 2 double_crochet repeat from * around slip_stitch in first single_crochet to join place marker do skip stitches behind the spsc in first spsc of round 60 70 80 single_crochet 12 14 16
